00027 #include "kvi_settings.h"
00028 #include "kvi_heapobject.h"
00029 #include "kvi_string.h"
00030 #include "kvi_pointerlist.h"
00031 
00032 #include <QRect>
00033 #include <QPoint>
00034 #include <QSize>
00035 
00036 class KVILIB_API KviParameterList : public KviPointerList<KviStr>, public KviHeapObject
00037 {
00038 public:
00039         KviParameterList();
00040         KviParameterList(KviStr *p1);
00041         KviParameterList(KviStr *p1,KviStr *p2);
00042         KviParameterList(KviStr *p1,KviStr *p2,KviStr *p3);
00043         KviParameterList(KviStr *p1,KviStr *p2,KviStr *p3,KviStr *p4);
00044         KviParameterList(KviStr *p1,KviStr *p2,KviStr *p3,KviStr *p4,KviStr *p5);
00045         KviParameterList(KviStr *p1,KviStr *p2,KviStr *p3,KviStr *p4,KviStr *p5,KviStr *p6);
00046         KviParameterList(KviStr *p1,KviStr *p2,KviStr *p3,KviStr *p4,KviStr *p5,KviStr *p6,KviStr *p7);
00047         KviParameterList(const char * paramBuffer);
00048         virtual ~KviParameterList();
00049 private:
00050         KviStr m_szEmpty;
00051 public:
00052         void         init(){ (void)first(); };
00053         // These functions have to be called when the
00054         // current() points to the FIRST item that has
00055         // to be interpreted as Bool,Int,UInt,Rect etc...
00056         // At the call exit the current() points
00057         // to the first item that was NOT used by the call
00058         bool         getBool();
00059         int          getInt(bool * bOk = 0);
00060         unsigned int getUInt(bool * bOk = 0);
00061         QRect        getRect(bool * bOk = 0);
00062         QPoint       getPoint(bool * bOk = 0);
00063         QSize        getSize(bool * bOk = 0);
00064         KviStr *     safeFirst();
00065         KviStr *     safeNext();
00066         const char * safeFirstParam(){ return safeFirst()->ptr(); };
00067         const char * safeNextParam(){ return safeNext()->ptr(); };
00068 
00069 };
